Question
========

The probability distribution of blood groups in the Netherlands is as follows: P(O) = 0.38; P(B) = 0.33; P(A) = 0.20; P(AB) = 0.09. What is the probability of a randomly selected Dutch blood donor with blood group A or blood group AB?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,018
* 0,205
* 0,290
* 0,317

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,018: Incorrect
* 0.205: Incorrect
* 0.290: Correct
* 0.317: Incorrect
